perturbation.original_text: Supplier will not sell, ship or otherwise dispose of any such merchandise except upon the order of Purchaser or Playboy; (iii) Supplier will never make, cause others to make or assist others in making, any claim whatsoever to any or all of the Playboy Properties or any trademark, copyright, designation, name, phrase, design or symbol similar thereto in connection with the manufacture, advertising, promotion, sale or distribution of merchandise
perturbation.changed_text: Supplier will not sell, ship or otherwise dispose of any such merchandise except upon what they believe to be the order of Purchaser or Playboy; (iii) Supplier will attempt to avoid making claims whatsoever to any or all of the Playboy Properties or any trademark, copyright, designation, name, phrase, design or symbol similar thereto in connection with the manufacture, advertising, promotion, sale or distribution of merchandise
perturbation.explanation: The phrase 'except upon what they believe to be the order' introduces ambiguity regarding the supplier's responsibility to verify the authenticity of the order. The phrase 'attempt to avoid making claims' does not provide a legal certainty.

perturbation.original_text: Supplier will defend, indemnify and hold harmless Purchaser and Playboy and the distributors and dealers and the officers and employees of each of the foregoing against all liability whatsoever which may be incurred by them or any of them as a result of any alleged defects in material or workmanship in the merchandise covered by this Contract.
perturbation.changed_text: Supplier will consider defending, indemnifying and holding harmless Purchaser and Playboy and the distributors and dealers and the officers and employees of each of the foregoing against some liability which may be incurred by them as a result of defects in material or workmanship in the merchandise covered by this Contract.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'will defend, indemnify and hold harmless' to 'will consider defending, indemnifying and holding harmless' makes the obligation discretionary rather than mandatory. The change from 'all liability whatsoever' to 'some liability' diminishes the extent of the supplier's responsibility, making it ambiguous what liabilities are covered.

perturbation.original_text: Supplier further agrees that it will not produce, cause to be produced or assist in the production of more units than are specified by Purchaser nor will Supplier produce, cause to be produced or assist in the production of any product or item not specifically requested by Purchaser using any or all of the Playboy Properties or any trademark, copyright, designations, names, phrases, designs or symbols similar to any or all of the Playboy Properties during or at any time after the completion of merchandise requested by this Contract.
perturbation.changed_text: Supplier agrees that it will try not to produce, cause to be produced or assist in the production of more units than are specified by Purchaser, and Supplier will try to avoid producing, causing to be produced or assisting in the production of any product or item not specifically requested by Purchaser using any or all of the Playboy Properties or any trademark, copyright, designations, names, phrases, designs or symbols similar to any or all of the Playboy Properties during or at some time after the completion of merchandise requested by this Contract.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'will not produce' to 'will try not to produce' and 'will try to avoid producing' weakens the obligation, making it non-committal and difficult to enforce. 'Some time after' creates uncertainty about the duration of the restriction.
